  • Uses of CharTokenizer in org.apache.lucene.analysis.core

    Subclasses of CharTokenizer in org.apache.lucene.analysis.core
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    LetterTokenizer
    A LetterTokenizer is a tokenizer that divides text at non-letters.
    final class 
    UnicodeWhitespaceTokenizer
    A UnicodeWhitespaceTokenizer is a tokenizer that divides text at whitespace.
    final class 
    WhitespaceTokenizer
    A tokenizer that divides text at whitespace characters as defined by Character.isWhitespace(int).
